title: January 6 committee issues subpoenas to 5 House Republicans, including Kevin McCarthy - CNN
content:
1. January 6 committee issues subpoenas to 5 House Republicans, including Kevin McCarthy  CNN
  2. Jan. 6 Panel Subpoenas 5 Republican Representatives  The New York Times
  3. Committee Investigating Jan. 6 Capitol Riot Subpoenas Kevin McCarthy, Other Lawmakers  The Wall Street Journal
  4. January 6 committee subpoenas 5 GOP lawmakers  CNN
  5. Jan. 6 committee subpoenas Kevin McCarthy, four other House Republicans  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The House select committee investigating the January 6 attack on the US Capitol is taking the extraordinary step of sending subpoenas to House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy and four other Republican lawmakers who have rejected the panel's requests to voluntarily cooperate.
